docs.title: 🗺  mapicgc-gl-js
docs.text: La biblioteca MapICGC GL JS, creada com a envoltori de MapLibreGL, ofereix noves funcions específiques en un entorn ICGC. Simplifica el desenvolupament integrant característiques com tessel·les vectorials i imatges satel·litals, i incorporar de manera inmediata estils, terrenys i dades ICGC. Proporciona funcions documentades per la creació d'un visor complet i totalment personalitzable.

docs.title: Instal.lació
docs.text:
• 1.1.Instal·lació via NPM
  • 1.1.Instal·lació via CDN

  • 2.7.Afegir marcador

  • 2.11.Fetch dades
  • 2.12.Fetch dades i crea menú
  • 2.13.Consulta d'elements
  • 2.14.Afegir geocodificador ICGC

docs.title: Documentació
docs.text: • 3.1.Funcions

docs.title: Autor i Contacte
docs.text: Unitat Geostart, Institut Cartogràfic i Geològic de Catalunya.

docs.title: Instal·lació amb NPM
docs.text:
Si utilitzes npm (Node Package Manager) per gestionar les dependències del teu projecte, segueix aquests passos:

  1. Obre la teva terminal i navega fins al directori del teu projecte.

  2. Executa la següent comanda per instal·lar mapicgc-gl-js:

npm install mapicgc-gl-js

Això descarregarà i instal·larà la llibreria al teu projecte.

3.. Un cop completada la instal·lació, pots importar la llibreria al teu codi:

 const llibreria = require('mapicgc-gl-js'); //ES6

o

  import * as mapicgcgl from "mapicgc-gl-js"

Ara estàs llest per començar a utilitzar mapicgc-gl-js, seguint l'exemple següent:

<script>
  import { Map, Styles } from "mapicgc-gl-js";
  //import * as mapicgc from  "mapicgc-gl-js" ****;
  const map = new Map({
    container: "map",
    style: Styles.LIGHT, // or mapicgc.Styles.LIGHT ****
    hash: true,
    center: [2.1282, 41.45],
    pitch: 0,
    maxZoom: 20,
    zoom: 8,

    bearing: 0,
  });
</script>

docs.title: Instal·lació amb CDN
docs.text:
Si prefereixes utilitzar un CDN per incorporar la llibreria al teu projecte, pots seguir aquests passos:

  1. Obre la teva terminal i navega fins al directori del teu projecte.

  2. Afegir la següent línia al teu fitxer HTML, generalment col·locada dins la secció <head>:

<script src="https://tilemaps.icgc.cat/cdn/mapicgc-gl-js/mapicgc-gl.js"></script>
<link
  href="https://tilemaps.icgc.cat/cdn/mapicgc-gl-js/mapicgc-gl.css"
  rel="stylesheet"
/>

Això carregarà la llibreria directament des del CDN. Ara estàs llest per utilitzar mapicgc-gl-js al teu projecte, seguint l'exemple següent:

<html>
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <title>Exemple llibreria mapicgc-gl-js</title>
    <meta
      name="viewport"
      content="initial-scale=1,maximum-scale=1,user-scalable=no"
    />
    <script src="https://tilemaps.icgc.cat/cdn/mapicgc-gl-js/mapicgc-gl.js"></script>
    <link
      href="https://tilemaps.icgc.cat/cdn/mapicgc-gl-js/mapicgc-gl.css"
      rel="stylesheet"
    />

    <style>
      body {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
      }
      #map {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        bottom: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
      }
    </style>
  </head>
  <body>
    <div id="map"></div>
    <script>
      const map = new mapicgcgl.Map({
        container: "map",
        style: mapicgcgl.Styles.TOPO,
        center: [2.1464, 41.306],
        zoom: 7.4,
        maxZoom: 14,
        hash: true,
        pitch: 0,

      });
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

See the Pen example-map-001 by unitatgeostart (@unitatgeostart) on CodePen.

docs.title: Codi
docs.text:
<html>
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <title>Exemple mapicgc-gl-js: Afegir 3D</title>
    <meta
      name="viewport"
      content="initial-scale=1,maximum-scale=1,user-scalable=no"
    />
    <script src="https://tilemaps.icgc.cat/cdn/mapicgc-gl-js/mapicgc-gl.js"></script>
    <link
      href="https://tilemaps.icgc.cat/cdn/mapicgc-gl-js/mapicgc-gl.css"
      rel="stylesheet"
    />

    <style>
      body {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
      }
      #map {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        bottom: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
      }
    </style>
  </head>
  <body>
    <div id="map"></div>
    <script>
      const map = new mapicgcgl.Map({
        container: "map",
        style: mapicgcgl.Styles.ORTO,
        center: [0.959, 42.201],
        zoom: 13,
        maxZoom: 14,
        hash: true,
        pitch: 80,
        bearing: 40,
      });
      map.on("load", () => {
        map.addSource("terrainSource", {
          type: "raster",
          url: "https://demotiles.maplibre.org/terrain-      tiles/tiles.json",
          tileSize: 256,
          maxzoom: 19,
        });
        map.setTerrain({
          source: "terrainSource",
          exaggeration: 2.5,
        });
      });
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

docs.text:
<html>
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <title>Exemple mapicgc-gl-js: Afegir 3D de l'ICGC</title>
    <meta
      name="viewport"
      content="initial-scale=1,maximum-scale=1,user-scalable=no"
    />
    <script src="https://tilemaps.icgc.cat/cdn/mapicgc-gl-js/mapicgc-gl.js"></script>
    <link
      href="https://tilemaps.icgc.cat/cdn/mapicgc-gl-js/mapicgc-gl.css"
      rel="stylesheet"
    />

    <style>
      body {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
      }
      #map {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        bottom: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
      }
    </style>
  </head>
  <body>
    <div id="map"></div>
    <script>
      const map = new mapicgcgl.Map({
        container: "map",
        style: mapicgcgl.Styles.ORTO,
        center: [0.959, 42.201],
        zoom: 13,
        maxZoom: 14,
        hash: true,
        pitch: 80,
        bearing: 40,
      });
      map.on("load", () => {
        map.addTerrainICGC(mapicgcgl.Terrains.ICGC5M, "bottom-right");
      });
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

.addLogo(options)

See the Pen Exemple AddMarker by unitatgeostart (@unitatgeostart) on CodePen.

CodePen

docs.title: Codi
docs.text:
<html>
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <title>Exemple mapicgc-gl-js: Afegir logo</title>
    <meta
      name="viewport"
      content="initial-scale=1,maximum-scale=1,user-scalable=no"
    />
    <script src="https://tilemaps.icgc.cat/cdn/mapicgc-gl-js/mapicgc-gl.js"></script>
    <link
      href="https://tilemaps.icgc.cat/cdn/mapicgc-gl-js/mapicgc-gl.css"
      rel="stylesheet"
    />

    <style>
      body {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
      }
      #map {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        bottom: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
      }
      #logos {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: row;
        bottom: 1px;
        position: absolute;
        left: 10px;
      }
    </style>
  </head>
  <body>
    <div id="map"></div>
    <div id="logos"></div>
    <script>
      const map = new mapicgcgl.Map({
        container: "map",
        style: mapicgcgl.Styles.TOPO,
        center: [2.1464, 41.306],
        zoom: 7.4,
        maxZoom: 14,
        hash: true,
        pitch: 0,
      });
      let options = {
        id: "icgcColorLogo",
        url: "https://betaserver.icgc.cat/logos/ICGC_color_norma.svg",
        href: "https://www.icgc.cat",
      };
      map.on("load", () => {
        map.addLogo(options);
      });
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

docs.title: Codi
docs.text:
<html>
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <title>Exemple mapicgc-gl-js: Fetch dades</title>
    <meta
      name="viewport"
      content="initial-scale=1,maximum-scale=1,user-scalable=no"
    />
    <script src="https://tilemaps.icgc.cat/cdn/mapicgc-gl-js/mapicgc-gl.js"></script>
    <link
      href="https://tilemaps.icgc.cat/cdn/mapicgc-gl-js/mapicgc-gl.css"
      rel="stylesheet"
    />

    <style>
      body {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
      }
      #map {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        bottom: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
      }
    </style>
  </head>
  <body>
    <div id="map"></div>
    <nav id="menu-group" class="filter-group"></nav>

    <script>
      const map = new mapicgcgl.Map({
        container: "map",
        style: mapicgcgl.Styles.LIGHT,
        center: [1.808, 41.618],
        zoom: 10,
        maxZoom: 14,
        hash: true,
        pitch: 0,
      });

      let paintOptions = {
        "line-color": "green",
        "line-width": 3,
        "line-opacity": 1,
      };

      map.on("load", () => {
        map.fetchData(
          "https://analisi.transparenciacatalunya.cat/resource/pzaa-n72w.geojson",
          "RutesMontserrat",
          paintOptions
        );
      });
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

      href="https://tilemaps.icgc.cat/cdn/mapicgc-gl-js/mapicgc-gl.css"

        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;

        bottom: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;

docs.text:
.addFeatureQuery(layer, options)

Retorna informació al fer clic sobre un element

See the Pen Exemple Consulta d'elements by unitatgeostart (@unitatgeostart) on CodePen.

CodePen

docs.title: Codi
docs.text:
<html>
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <title>Exemple mapicgc-gl-js: Consulta d'elements</title>
    <meta
      name="viewport"
      content="initial-scale=1,maximum-scale=1,user-scalable=no"
    />
    <script src="https://tilemaps.icgc.cat/cdn/mapicgc-gl-js/mapicgc-gl.js"></script>
    <link
      href="https://tilemaps.icgc.cat/cdn/mapicgc-gl-js/mapicgc-gl.css"
      rel="stylesheet"
    />

    <style>
      body {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
      }
      #map {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        bottom: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
      }
    </style>
  </head>
  <body>
    <div id="map"></div>
    <nav id="menu-group" class="filter-group"></nav>

    <script>
      map.on("load", () => {
        let paintOptions = {
          "line-color": "red",
          "line-width": 2,
          "line-opacity": 0.5,
        };
        map.fetchData(
          "https://analisi.transparenciacatalunya.cat/resource/pzaa-n72w.geojson",
          "RutesMontserrat",
          paintOptions
        );

        // si volem camps específics:
        let queryFields = ["nom", "municipi"];
        map.addFeatureQuery("RutesMontserrat", queryFields);

        //si volem tots els paràmetres:
        // map.addFeatureQuery("RutesMontserrat");
      });
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

      const map = new mapicgcgl.Map({
        container: "map",

docs.title: Codi
docs.text:
<html>
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <title>Exemple mapicgc-gl-js: Afegir mapa base ICGC</title>
    <meta
      name="viewport"
      content="initial-scale=1,maximum-scale=1,user-scalable=no"
    />
    <script src="https://tilemaps.icgc.cat/cdn/mapicgc-gl-js/mapicgc-gl.js"></script>
    <link
      href="https://tilemaps.icgc.cat/cdn/mapicgc-gl-js/mapicgc-gl.css"
      rel="stylesheet"
    />

    <style>
      body {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
      }
      #map {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        bottom: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
      }
    </style>
  </head>
  <body>
    <div id="map"></div>
    <div id="basemap-group" class="basemap-group"></div>
    <script>
      // add basemap
      const map = new mapicgcgl.Map({
        container: "map",
        style: mapicgcgl.Styles.TOPO, // <-- add style basemap here
        center: [2.1464, 41.306],
        zoom: 7.4,
        maxZoom: 14,
        hash: true,
        pitch: 0,
      });
      map.on("load", () => {
        //add multiple ICGC basemaps and get a style menu component
        let basemapsicgc = [mapicgcgl.Styles.ORTO, mapicgcgl.Styles.TOPO];
        map.addBasemapsICGC(basemapsicgc);
      });
      //If you need to add basemaps from other sources, please follow the structure for each object
      //   let baseLayers = [
      //     {
      //       id: 0,
      //       value: "Mapa estàndard",
      //       label: "icgc_mapa_estandard_general",
      //        url: "https://geoserveis.icgc.cat/contextmaps/icgc_mapa_estandard_general.json",
      // image: "https://visors.icgc.cat/contextmaps/imatges_estil/icgc_mapa_estandard.png",
      //     },
      //     {
      //       id: 1,
      //       value: "Ortofotomapa híbrid",
      //       label: "icgc_orto_hibrida",
      //         url: "https://geoserveis.icgc.cat/contextmaps/icgc_orto_hibrida.json",
      // image: "https://visors.icgc.cat/contextmaps/imatges_estil/icgc_orto_hibrida.png",
      //     },
      //   ];
      //   map.addBasemaps(baseLayers);
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

<html>
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <title>Exemple mapicgc-gl-js: Afegir capa vector de l'ICGC</title>
    <meta
      name="viewport"
      content="initial-scale=1,maximum-scale=1,user-scalable=no"
    />
    <script src="https://tilemaps.icgc.cat/cdn/mapicgc-gl-js/mapicgc-gl.js"></script>
    <link
      href="https://tilemaps.icgc.cat/cdn/mapicgc-gl-js/mapicgc-gl.css"
      rel="stylesheet"
    />
    <script src="https://unpkg.com/flatgeobuf@3.26.2/dist/flatgeobuf-geojson.min.js"></script>

    <style>
      body {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
      }
      #map {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        bottom: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
      }
    </style>
  </head>
  <body>
    <div id="map"></div>
    <script>
      const map = new mapicgcgl.Map({
        container: "map",
        style: mapicgcgl.Styles.TOPO,
        center: [2.1464, 41.306],
        zoom: 7.4,
        maxZoom: 14,
        hash: true,
        pitch: 0,

      });
      map.on("load", () => {
        map.addVectorLayerICGC(
          mapicgcgl.Layers.VectorAdmin.provinciesVigent
        );
      });
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

.addLayerGeoJSON(geojsonLayer)

docs.title: Codi
docs.text:
<html>
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <title>Exemple mapicgc-gl-js: Afegir capa</title>
    <meta
      name="viewport"
      content="initial-scale=1,maximum-scale=1,user-scalable=no"
    />
    <script src="https://tilemaps.icgc.cat/cdn/mapicgc-gl-js/mapicgc-gl.js"></script>
    <link
      href="https://tilemaps.icgc.cat/cdn/mapicgc-gl-js/mapicgc-gl.css"
      rel="stylesheet"
    />

    <style>
      body {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
      }
      #map {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        bottom: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
      }
    </style>
  </head>
  <body>
    <div id="map"></div>
    <script>
      const map = new mapicgcgl.Map({
        container: "map",
        style: mapicgcgl.Styles.TOPO,
        center: [1.001, 41.759],
        zoom: 7.4,
        maxZoom: 14,
        hash: true,
        pitch: 0,

      });


      map.on("load", () => {

        let geojsonLayer = {
          id: "geojsonTest",
          data: {
            type: "Feature",
            geometry: {
              type: "Polygon",
              coordinates: [
                [
                  [1.3119, 41.489],
                  [1.0119, 41.489],
                  [1.0119, 42.0489],
                  [1.3119, 42.0489],
                ],
              ],
            },
          },
          layerType: "fill",
          layout: {},
          paint: {
            "fill-color": "#088",
            "fill-opacity": 0.8,
          },
        };
        map.addLayerGeoJSON(geojsonLayer);
      });
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

<html>
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <title>Exemple mapicgc-gl-js: Afegir arbre de capes</title>
    <meta
      name="viewport"
      content="initial-scale=1,maximum-scale=1,user-scalable=no"
    />
    <script src="https://tilemaps.icgc.cat/cdn/mapicgc-gl-js/mapicgc-gl.js"></script>
    <link
      href="https://tilemaps.icgc.cat/cdn/mapicgc-gl-js/mapicgc-gl.css"
      rel="stylesheet"
    />

    <style>
      body {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
      }
      #map {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        bottom: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
      }

    </style>
  </head>
  <body>
    <div id="map"></div>
    <nav id="filter-group" class="filter-group"></nav>
    <script>
      const map = new mapicgcgl.Map({
        container: "map",
        style: mapicgcgl.Styles.TOPO,
        center: [2.1464, 41.306],
        zoom: 6.4,
        maxZoom: 14,
        hash: true,
        pitch: 0,
      });

      let options = {
        features: {
          type: "FeatureCollection",
          features: [
            {
              type: "Feature",
              properties: {
                icon: "Rubí",
              },
              geometry: {
                type: "Point",
                coordinates: [2.0119, 41.489],
              },
            },

            {
              type: "Feature",
              properties: {
                icon: "Moià",
              },
              geometry: {
                type: "Point",
                coordinates: [2.119, 41.87],
              },
            },
            {
              type: "Feature",
              properties: {
                icon: "Les Borges Blanques",
              },
              geometry: {
                type: "Point",
                coordinates: [0.97319, 41.4589],
              },
            },
            {
              type: "Feature",
              properties: {
                icon: "Berga",
              },
              geometry: {
                type: "Point",
                coordinates: [1.83, 42.163],
              },
            },
          ],
        },
        id: "testLayer",
        type: "geojson",
      };
      map.on("load", () => {
        map.addLayerTree(options);
      });
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

      name="viewport"

    />
    <script src="https://tilemaps.icgc.cat/cdn/mapicgc-gl-js/mapicgc-gl.js"></script>

      body {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;

docs.title: Codi
docs.text:
<html>
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <title>Exemple mapicgc-gl-js: Afegir control</title>
    <meta
      name="viewport"
      content="initial-scale=1,maximum-scale=1,user-scalable=no"
    />
    <script src="https://tilemaps.icgc.cat/cdn/mapicgc-gl-js/mapicgc-gl.js"></script>
    <link
      href="https://tilemaps.icgc.cat/cdn/mapicgc-gl-js/mapicgc-gl.css"
      rel="stylesheet"
    />

    <link
      rel="stylesheet"
      href="https://unpkg.com/maplibre-gl@4.0.0/dist/maplibre-gl.css"
    />
    <script src="https://unpkg.com/maplibre-gl@4.0.0/dist/maplibre-gl.js"></script>

    <style>
      body {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
      }
      #map {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        bottom: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
      }
    </style>
  </head>
  <body>
    <div id="map"></div>
    <script>
      const map = new mapicgcgl.Map({
        container: "map",
        style: mapicgcgl.Styles.TOPO,
        center: [2.1464, 41.306],
        zoom: 7.4,
        maxZoom: 14,
        hash: true,
        pitch: 0,
      });
      map.on("load", () => {
        // mapicgc-gl-js library:
        map.addGeolocateControl(
          {
            positionOptions: {
              enableHighAccuracy: true,
            },
            trackUserLocation: true,
          },
          "bottom-right"
        );

        //export with options
        map.addExportControl(
          {
            PageSize: Size.A4,
            PageOrientation: PageOrientation.Landscape,
            Format: Format.PNG,
            DPI: DPI[300],
            Crosshair: true,
            PrintableArea: true,
          },
          "bottom-right"
        );
        //default export control
        map.addExportControl();

        // from other library
        map.addControl(new maplibregl.NavigationControl(), "bottom-right");
      });
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

docs.title: addGeolocateControl()

trackUserLocation: true },"bottom-right")

Crosshair: true, PrintableArea: true, }, "bottom-right")

docs.title: Codi
docs.text:
<html>
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <title>Exemple mapicgc-gl-js: Afegir comparador</title>
    <meta
      name="viewport"
      content="initial-scale=1,maximum-scale=1,user-scalable=no"
    />
    <script src="https://tilemaps.icgc.cat/cdn/mapicgc-gl-js/mapicgc-gl.js"></script>
    <link
      href="https://tilemaps.icgc.cat/cdn/mapicgc-gl-js/mapicgc-gl.css"
      rel="stylesheet"
    />

    <style>
      body {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
      }
      #map {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        bottom: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
      }
      .map {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        bottom: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
      }
    </style>
  </head>
  <body>
    <div id="comparison-container">
      <div id="before" class="map"></div>
      <div id="after" class="map"></div>
    </div>

    <script>
      const map1 = new mapicgcgl.Map({
        container: "before",
        style: mapicgcgl.Styles.ORTO,
        center: [1.1464, 41.706],
        zoom: 7.4,
        maxZoom: 14,
        hash: true,
        pitch: 0,

      });

      const map2 = new mapicgcgl.Map({
        container: "after",
        style: mapicgcgl.Styles.TOPO,
        center: [1.1464, 41.706],
        zoom: 7.4,
        maxZoom: 14,
        hash: true,
        pitch: 0,

      });

      var container = "#comparison-container";

      var map = new mapicgcgl.CompareMaps(map1, map2, container, {});
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

docs.title: addGeocoderICGC() → Object
docs.text:
Add geocoder.

Kind: global function Returns: Object - - The current position of the search result.

docs.title: getStyle() → Object
docs.text:
Retrieves the current style of the map.

Kind: global function Returns: Object - - The current style of the map.

docs.title: getConfigStyles() → Array
docs.text:
Retrieves the available base styles from default options.

Kind: global function Returns: Array - - Array containing the names of available base styles.

docs.title: getConfigWMSLayers() → Array
docs.text:
Retrieves the available WMS image layers from default options.

Kind: global function Returns: Array - - Array containing the keys of available WMS image layers.

docs.title: getConfigOrtoLayers() → Array
docs.text:
Retrieves the available orto image layers from default options.

Kind: global function Returns: Array - - Array containing the keys of available image layers.

docs.title: getConfigVectorLayers() → Array
docs.text:
Retrieves the available vector layers from default options.

Kind: global function Returns: Array - - Array containing the keys of available vector layers.

docs.title: getConfigVectorAdminLayers() → Array
docs.text:
Retrieves the available vector layers from default options.

Kind: global function Returns: Array - - Array containing the keys of available vectorAdmin layers.

docs.title: fetchData(url, name, options)
docs.text:
Fetches GeoJSON data from a URL and adds a corresponding layer to the map based on the specified geometry type.

Kind: global function

Param Type Description url string The URL to fetch GeoJSON data from. name string The geometry name (e.g., 'buildings'). options Object Additional options for configuring the layer.

docs.title: fetchDataAndMenu(url, name, featureTree, options)
docs.text:
Fetches GeoJSON data from a URL and adds a corresponding layer to the map based on the specified geometry type and adds to the Menu as a checkbox item.

Kind: global function

Param Type Description url string The URL to fetch GeoJSON data from. name string The geometry name (e.g., 'buildings'). featureTree string Import all features as unique or group based on a field ('all', 'field'). options Object Additional options for configuring the layer.

docs.title: on(type, func)
docs.text:
Adds an event listener to the map.

Kind: global function

Param Type Description type string The type of the event. func function The callback function to be executed when the event occurs.

docs.title: getSource(source)
docs.text:
Retrieves the specified source from the map.

Kind: global function

Param Type Description source string The ID of the source to retrieve.

docs.title: addSource(source, options)
docs.text:
Adds a source to the map.

Kind: global function

Param Type Description source string The ID of the source to add. options object The source options.

docs.title: setStyle(style, [options])
docs.text:
Sets the style of the map.

Kind: global function

Param Type Description style string Name of the map style. [options] Object Options for setting the style.

docs.title: getLayer(layerId)
docs.text:
Retrieves the layer with the specified ID from the map.

Kind: global function

Param Type Description layerId string The ID of the layer to retrieve.

docs.title: setFilter(layerId, filter, options)
docs.text:
Set filter for specified style layer.

Kind: global function

Param Type Description layerId string The ID of the layer to retrieve. filter array The filter. options string Options object.

docs.title: jumpTo(options)
docs.text:
Jumps to the specified coordinates and zoom on the map.

Kind: global function

Param Type Description options Object Coordinates and options to jump to: { center: [coordx, coordy], zoom: zoom, essential: true }.

docs.title: setLayoutProperty(object, property, value)
docs.text:
Sets layout property for a layer on the map.

Kind: global function

Param Type Description object Object Object containing layer ID. property Object Object containing property to set. value Object Object containing value.

docs.title: setPaintProperty(object, property, value)
docs.text:
Sets layout property for a layer on the map.

Kind: global function

Param Type Description object Object Object containing layer ID. property Object Object containing property to set. value Object Object containing value.

docs.title: addControl(control, [position])
docs.text:
Adds a control to the map with the specified position.

Kind: global function

Param Type Default Description control Object The control to add. [position] string "'top-right'" Position to add the control on the map.

docs.title: getZoom() → number
docs.text:
Retrieves the current zoom level of the map.

Kind: global function Returns: number - - The current zoom level.

docs.title: addMouseCoordControl()
docs.text:
Adds a mouse coordinate control to the map.

Kind: global function

docs.title: addGeolocateControl(options, [position])
docs.text:
Adds a geolocate control to the map.

Kind: global function

Param Type Default Description options Object Options for the geolocate control. [position] string "'top-right'" Position to add the control on the map.

docs.title: getBounds()
docs.text:
Retrieves the bounds of the map.

Kind: global function

docs.title: getCenter() → LngLat

Kind: global function Returns: LngLat - - The center coordinates of the map.

docs.title: addLayer(layer, layerIdOrder)
docs.text:
Adds a layer to the map.

Kind: global function

Param Type Description layer Object Options for the layer to add. layerIdOrder string Optional layer Id draw position.

docs.title: addLayerGeoJSON(layer)
docs.text:
Adds a GeoJSON layer to the map.

Kind: global function

Param Type Description layer Object Options for the GeoJSON layer to add. layer.id string Unique identifier for the layer. layer.type string Type of layer ('geojson'). layer.data Object GeoJSON data for the layer. layer.layerType string Map layer type (e.g., 'symbol', 'circle', 'fill'). layer.layout Object Layer layout configuration. layer.paint Object Layer paint configuration.

docs.title: addLayerWMS(layer)

Adds a WMS layer to the map.

Kind: global function

Param Type Description layer Object Options for the WMS layer to add. layer.id string Unique identifier for the layer. layer.type string Type of layer ('raster'). layer.tiles Array.<string> Tiles for the raster layer.

docs.title: removeControl(control)
docs.text:
Removes a control from the map.

Kind: global function

Param Type Description control Object The control to remove.

docs.title: removeLayer(layerId)

Removes a layer from the map.

Kind: global function

Param Type Description layerId string Identifier of the layer to remove.

docs.title: removeSource(layerId)
docs.text:
Removes a source from the map.

Kind: global function

Param Type Description layerId string Identifier of the source to remove.

Adds a logo to the map.

Kind: global function

Param Type Description options Object Options for the logo to add. options.id string Unique identifier for the logo. options.url string URL of the logo image. options.href string URL to navigate to when the logo is clicked.

docs.title: addBasemapsICGC(basesArray)

Adds base layers to the map.

Adds a scale control to the map. * @function addScaleControl

Kind: global function

Adds an export control to the map with the provided options and position.

docs.title: addPopup(coordinates, text)

Adds a marker to the map.

Kind: global function Returns: Object - - Instance of the added marker.

Param Type Description options Object Options for the marker to add. options.text string Text content for the marker popup. options.options Object Marker options. options.coord LngLatLike Coordinates for placing the marker. options.textOffset Object Text offset for the marker popup.

docs.title: addPopup(options, coord, text) → Object
docs.text:
Adds a popup to the map.

Kind: global function Returns: Object - - Instance of the added popup.

Param Type Description options Object Options for the popup to add. coord LngLatLike Coordinates for placing the popup. text string HTML content for the popup.

docs.title: addFullScreen([position])

Adds a fullscreen control to the map.

Kind: global function

Param Type Default Description [position] string "'top-right'" Position to add the control on the map.

docs.title: addMenuItem(name)

Adds a menu item with a checkbox for controlling the visibility of a layer on the map.

Kind: global function

Param Type Description name string The name of the layer corresponding to the menu item.

docs.title: addLayerTree(options)

Kind: global function

docs.title: createNavigationControl(options, [position]) → Object
docs.text:
Creates a navigation control with the provided options.

docs.title: addNavigationControl(options, [position])

Kind: global function

Internal method to handle map styles.

Kind: global function Returns: string - - URL of the map style.

docs.title: addImageLayerICGC(name)
docs.text:
Adds an ICGC image layer to the map based on the specified name and year.

Kind: global function

Param Type Description name string The name of the layer. Mandatory. options: 'orto', 'geo', 'slope', 'dem', 'relleu', etc.

Adds an ICGC vector layer to the map based on the specified name and year.

Kind: global function

Param Type Description url string The url of the vector layer.

docs.title: addTerrainICGC(resolution, [positionButton])
docs.text:
Adds 3D terrain to the map using hillshade.

Kind: global function

Param Type Default Description resolution string resolution of the terrain data: 2m or 5m. [positionButton] string "'top-right'" Position to add the button on the map.
